p: The multi-model ensemble produced by the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project in support of the Fifth Assessment Report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC), referred to as CMIP5 (Taylor et al. 2012), reproduces the observed twentieth century evolution of Sahel rainfall and projects wetter end of twenty-first century conditions more coherently than its CMIP3 predecessor (e.g., compare Biasutti and Giannini ( 2006) with Biasutti ( 2013)).
